This <S%G5126><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> hath <S%G2316>God<s%> raised <S%G450>up,<s%> <S%G3739>whereof<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>
